name: LowPoly Adventure (fahriorafly)
description:
Play as a human find and pick up items (Star, Diamond, Emerald) to increase the score don't forget to pay attention to the time, if the time runs out the game is over.

 LPA has two gameplay modes! Playing with time and playing without time.

I really hope you will enjoy this short game and would love to hear any kind of feedback!

Controls :

Forward = W 

Backward = S 

Turn Left = A 

Turn Right = D 

Sprint = Left Shift 

Jump = Space
